response.original_title: Dirty Secrets: Jennifer, Everardo & the CIA in Guatemala
response.overview: Jennifer Harbury's courageous search for her missing husband Everardo – a Mayan rebel leader – reveals the dark legacy of decades of CIA complicity in Guatemalan human rights abuses. DIRTY SECRETS tells a remarkable story of speaking truth to power as it follows Harbury through a frightening journey to save Everardo and stop the killing in Guatemala.
response.title: Dirty Secrets: Jennifer, Everardo & the CIA in Guatemala
